snippet: For people who have grown cynical about self-help, new books teach you how to toughen up, ignore the haters and know your league. Brace yourself.
abstract: Molly Young reviews selection of self-help books from 2015.
lead_paragraph: For people who have grown cynical about self-help, new books teach you how to toughen up, ignore the haters and know your league. Brace yourself.
